name: I accidently insulted a witch and now all of my clothes are sentient and they hate me! (Or Hanging in the Closet)
name_original: I accidently insulted a witch and now all of my clothes are sentient and they hate me! (Or Hanging in the Closet)
description:
I accidently insulted a witch and now all of my clothes are sentient and they hate me! 

Usually, after a late night drinking, people like to not do anything the day afterwards. Unfortunately for Page, she insulted a witch last night and now has to fight all her clothes in order to wear them again. Armed with only her (slightly worn) clothes from last night, it's up to you to help Page with her quest in a story of redemption, perseverance and self-acceptance. 

Inspired by Collect-Em-All RPGs, weird story premises and my own personal experiences with being Genderqueer. 

Credits:

HouseTiles created by VexedEnigma from the Horror City Tile Pack

Player Sprite created by VexedEnigma from the Horror City Tile Pack

Battle Music is w1x by Rolemusic

Other Music is Python by Rolemusic

Clothes Sprites by me!

Sound Effects by Kenny Assets

Main Font is Equipment by Eeve Somepx
